bibl.seg: MESSERI Gabriella, Official and Private Archives in the Papyri.

Α’ διεθνές συμπόσιο αρχειακών. Αρχεία και προοπτικές στη νέα χιλιετία, Κύπρος, 4-6 Μαΐου 2000. 1st International Symposium of Archivists. Archival Prospectives in the New Millennium, Cyprus, 4-6 May 2000 (Athena, 2001) pp. 61-69.

[Introduction.] - I. Family Archives and Archives Concerning Individuals. - II. Archives of Entrepreneurs and Private Professionals. - III. Mixed Archives and Dossier. - IV. Archives Deriving from Administrative Offices. - Examples for each of the 4 categories. - Methodological Observations.
